NK080(wu)020:1: // zhi khro'i gtor dbang bzhugs so //
NK080(wu)020:2: bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'atsala lo //
NK080(wu)020:3: zhi khro chos skyong dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dbang rgyas par bya na /
NK080(wu)020:4: thun mong dang khyad par gyi mchod pa rgyas par bshams pa spyir mthun no //
NK080(wu)020:6: lug sha la gzugs g.yas pa gcig brgyan du byas pa zur du mdzad /
NK080(wu)020:7: zhi khro'i phrin las dzab yan chad mdzad slob ma khrus bya bgegs gtor byin la bskrad /
NK080(wu)020:8: de nas sems bskyed pa sngon du 'gro bas zhi
NK080(wu)020:9: khro'i gtor ma zhi khro'i lha tshogs su rgyas par
NK080(wu)020:11: gzhan yang bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro chos skyong
NK080(wu)020:12: gi tshogs dpag tu med pa spyan drangs nas bstim
NK080(wu)020:13: pa de dag la mos gus byed du gzhug /sngar
NK080(wu)020:14: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la sems bskyed rgyas
NK080(wu)020:15: par skabs dang sbyar ba yang mdzad gsung /
NK080(wu)020:16: rnying pa la me tog dor tsam re yang mdzad pas lag tu me tog thogs la /
NK080(wu)020:17: bdag gi rig pa'i me tog 'di //
NK080(wu)020:18: zhes pa bla mas brjod de /
NK080(wu)020:19: slob mas lad mo byas la me tog dor /
NK080(wu)020:20: zhi khro'i lha'i thugs kar phog ste sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs par bsam /
NK080(wu)020:21: ka ba rtsi dang yon tan phrin las kyis byin
NK080(wu)020:22: gyis brlab tu gsol snyam pa'i mos gus byed du
NK080(wu)020:23: bcug la / bla mas dpal ldan rdo rje'i sku 'chang ba /
NK080(wu)020:25: slob mas rjes su lan mo bya'o //
NK080(wu)020:26: de nas zhi ba'i gtor ma spyi bor bzhag la /
NK080(wu)020:27: b+ho d+hi tsit+ta ma h+aa su kha dz+ny+aa na d+ha
NK080(wu)020:28: du a a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum sa ma ya sti
NK080(wu)020:30: de nas yang khro bo'i gtor ma spyi bor bzhag /h+aum ha he phata b+h+yo /
NK080(wu)020:31: a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum sa ma ya sti sta lhan /
NK080(wu)020:32: ces pas gtor ma'i lha tshogs slob ma'i rtog tshogs kyi gnas su bstim mo //
NK080(wu)020:33: de'ang rang gi rtog tshogs dal du gnas pa dam tshig gi dal /
NK080(wu)020:34: gtor ma ye shes kyi lhar bskyed pa ye shes kyi dal dang gnyis su med par bsgom /
NK080(wu)020:35: mdor na snod kyi lo ka gzhal yas khang /
NK080(wu)020:36: bcud kyi sems lha'i dkyil 'khor du bsgoms la /
NK080(wu)020:37: rang lha'i nga rgyal du gsal bas chos skyong bcol thug gyer /
NK080(wu)020:38: zhi khro'i gtor dbang mdor bsdus pa'o //
NK080(wu)020:39: tshe 'das lus barjesa rigs kyi bu /
NK080(wu)020:44: de'i bag chags de shin tu 'jigs par yod /
NK080(wu)020:45: de la gri 'grol gyi cho ga ma byas na /
NK080(wu)020:47: yang yang du 'khrul cing brtan pa'am /
NK080(wu)020:48: dga' ba'i bag chags bsgo dka' bar 'gyur ro //
NK080(wu)020:49: de la slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi gdams pa mnga' bdag nyang ral pa can gyis /
NK080(wu)020:50: lho brag rna bo mchog gi gter nas bton pa'i gri 'grol gyi cho ga ni /
NK080(wu)020:51: tshe 'das pa de mdun du gsal bar bsgoms la /
NK080(wu)020:52: de'i lus yi ge n+ri sngo skya'i d+r+wa ba sprel
NK080(wu)020:53: ma keng rus kyi lus lta bur yod pa'i snying
NK080(wu)020:54: gar bar do'i rnam par shes pa /
NK080(wu)020:55: yi ge a dkar po zil gyi mnan par bsam /
NK080(wu)020:56: n+ri'i d+r+wa ba sbrel ba dang 'dra ba'i gseb nas
NK080(wu)020:57: k+sha yig dmar skya sha lcags bzhin btsags nas yod
NK080(wu)020:58: par bsam / de la rang yi dam du gsal ba'i thugs ka nas /
NK080(wu)020:59: yi ge h+aum dkar po'i 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK080(wu)020:60: h+aum de dag gis n+ri'i d+r+wa ba lus kyi rnam par can de hrul gyis bshig nas /
NK080(wu)020:61: snga ma'i lus kyi bag chags dang bral bar bsam /
NK080(wu)020:62: yang thugs rje'i sa bon las /
NK080(wu)020:63: phata dmar ser dpag tu med pa 'phros pas /
NK080(wu)020:64: k+sha yi yi ge de rnams thor gyis gtor nas /
NK080(wu)020:65: gang gi rkyen gyis grir shi ba'i 'jigs skrag gi snang ba de /
NK080(wu)020:66: sangs kyis ya bar bsams la /
NK080(wu)020:67: ngag tu a n+ri k+sha h+aum phata /
NK080(wu)020:68: ces pa brgya rtsa brjod cing /
NK080(wu)020:69: g.yas su sa rdza ra rji'i me bzhag /g.yon du
NK080(wu)020:70: dri chu bzhag /til lam yungs kar gyis mtshan byang
NK080(wu)020:71: la brab / dri gos sam sil snyan bskor zhing /
NK080(wu)020:72: g.yon gyis g.yas kyi me la gtor /
NK080(wu)020:73: g.yas kyi g.yon gyi chu la bsgyur ro //
NK080(wu)020:74: mthar h+aum dang phata kyi k+sha yig rnams bshig cing gtor bas mi dmigs par gyur te /
NK080(wu)020:75: n+ri rang bzhin med par sangs te /
NK080(wu)020:76: snga ma'i lus kyi bag chags ngan pa dag cing /
NK080(wu)020:77: k+sha rang bzhin med par sangs pas /
NK080(wu)020:78: snga ma'i lus kyi bag chags ngan pa dag cing /
NK080(wu)020:79: 'jigs skrag gi bag chags ngan pa dag ste /
NK080(wu)020:80: lus dang snang ba de sangs kyis grol nas /
NK080(wu)020:81: bar do'i rnam par shes pa /
NK080(wu)020:82: a dngul chu'i kha dog lta bu'i gzugs su 'khril med par rgyangs kyis 'thon par bsams la /
NK080(wu)020:83: dri ma de lan gcig bshig la /
NK080(wu)020:84: dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang /
NK080(wu)020:85: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
NK080(wu)020:86: thugs rje dang phrin las kyis byin gyis brlab cing
NK080(wu)020:87: / tshe 'das pa che ge mo zhes bya ba
NK080(wu)020:88: bag chags ngan pa'i bcag dang bral bar gyur cig
NK080(wu)020:89: / /ces pas / sor mo rnams phyir dgrol ba'i phyag rgyas /
NK080(wu)020:92: badz+ra sa ma ya tra tha /
NK080(wu)020:94: de nas dri'i chu des mtshan byang de bkrus la chu de blugs te /
NK080(wu)020:95: dri gos la lan gsum bskor la phyir dor ro //
NK080(wu)020:96: de nas dri ma de legs par bcos la /
NK080(wu)020:97: dkyil 'khor gyi lho sgor sbyor stegs khru gang ba la /
NK080(wu)020:98: pad+ma dkar po'i lte bar 'khor lo sngon po bris pa'i steng du bzhag ste /
NK080(wu)020:99: dri gos tshe 'das pa'i lus su bsgom mo //
NK080(wu)020:100: pra be sha ya phata ce pas lus kyi sgo phyes /
NK080(wu)020:101: a be sha ya a ces pas rnam par shes pa de lus kyi nang du bzhugs /
NK080(wu)020:102: de las gzhan du ni mi g.yo zhing brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
NK080(wu)020:103: snying gar ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa gcig bsam /
NK080(wu)020:104: de'i lte ba la yi ge h+aum dkar po gcig bsam /
NK080(wu)020:105: de la dza zhes pas rnam shes nye bar dgug /h+aum /
NK080(wu)020:106: zhes rdo rje'i lte ba'i h+aum las bstim zhing gzhug
NK080(wu)020:107: /bam zhes pas de dang dbyer med cing rkyen gyis
NK080(wu)020:109: ho zhes pas dgyes pas bskyed de gsal zhing brtan par bya'o //
NK080(wu)020:110: de nas gshed dang bral bas bgegs kyi mi tshugs pa'i srung ba bya /
NK080(wu)020:111: rdo rje rtse gcig gi phyag rgya bcas te /
NK080(wu)020:112: dri ma'i spyir bor bzhag ste /
NK080(wu)020:113: badz+ra ka la sha rak+sha rak+sha h+aum /
NK080(wu)020:115: tshe 'das pa'i lus rdo rje'i khrab kyis zhu lugs su gyur te /
NK080(wu)020:116: rdo rje phra mos ba spu'i bu ga rnams bstims par bsam pas /
NK080(wu)020:117: bdud dang bgegs kyi tshugs par mi nus pa'i mthu
NK080(wu)020:118: dang nus pa mchog tu gyur pa thob par bsam
NK080(wu)020:119: / spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgyas btab bo //
NK080(wu)020:120: 'dis sems can mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig /dge'o //
